alert.note: Alert for Bates (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Linn and southwestern Bates Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kincaid, or 10 miles south of Garnett, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pleasanton, Mound City, Hume, Blue Mound, Prescott, Amoret, Foster and Worland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for east central Kansas...and west central Missouri.
